title: RD - Astroworld Aftermath & Rittenhouse Trial
itunes:title: RD - Astroworld Aftermath & Rittenhouse Trial
description:
Adam and Mark link up to discuss the tragedy in Houston at Travis Scott's Astroworld festival and what legal implications are likely forthcoming. They also examine some video from the Kyle Rittenhouse trial where a very frustrated judge pulls no punches when dealing with the prosecutor.
